timelinePoints.desc: A React Native app is a real mobile app. With React Native, you don't build a mobile web app, an HTML5 app, or a hybrid app. ... React Native uses the same fundamental UI building blocks as regular iOS and Android apps. You just put those building blocks together using JavaScript and React.
